Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a misleading video that has been debunked.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video is not genuine and is taken from a television series.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by falsely portraying the video as bodies of COVID-19 victims being thrown into a ditch.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video is an accurate representation of the situation in Italy, which is not the case.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the video is from a television series and not a real incident.
